content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans for the Sentiment-Curator project. 

Let me start by understanding the current state of the project by examining key files.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="read_file">
<parameter name="path">C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator\README.md</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<tool_calls>
<invoke name="read_file">
<parameter name="path">C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator\docs\TECH_STACK.md</parameter>
</invoke>
</tool_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd "C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator" && find . -name "*.md" -type f | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cd "C:\Users\jaewoong\Desktop\project\Sentiment-Curator" && ls -la</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

I'm warmed up and ready to explore your codebase. I can see this is a Sentiment-Curator project with both backend and frontend components, currently on a "restart" branch with several uncommitted changes related to crawler functionality.

What requirements would you like me to explore and plan for?
